externalDocs.description: Find out more about data usage.

schema.title: Date Range
schema.description: This data structure represents a date range.

x-codeSamples.source:
curl --request GET \
  --url 'https://api.coralogix.com/mgmt/openapi/dataplans/data-usage/v2?date_range=SOME_OBJECT_VALUE&resolution=SOME_STRING_VALUE&aggregate=SOME_ARRAY_VALUE&dimension_filters=SOME_ARRAY_VALUE' \
  --header 'Authorization: Bearer <API_KEY>'

curl --request POST \
  --url https://api.coralogix.com/mgmt/openapi/dataplans/data-usage/v2/daily:evaluation-tokens \
  --header 'Authorization: Bearer <API_KEY>' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"dateRange":{"fromDate":"2021-01-01T00:00:00.000Z","toDate":"2021-01-01T00:00:00.000Z"}}'

curl --request POST \
  --url https://api.coralogix.com/mgmt/openapi/dataplans/data-usage/v2/daily:processed-gbs \
  --header 'Authorization: Bearer <API_KEY>' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"range":"RANGE_UNSPECIFIED"}'

curl --request POST \
  --url https://api.coralogix.com/mgmt/openapi/dataplans/data-usage/v2/daily:units \
  --header 'Authorization: Bearer <API_KEY>' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"range":"RANGE_UNSPECIFIED"}'

get.summary: Get Data Usage Metrics Export Status

x-codeSamples.source:
import requests

url = "https://api.coralogix.com/mgmt/openapi/dataplans/data-usage/v2/export-status"

headers = {"Authorization": "Bearer <API_KEY>"}

response = requests.request("GET", url, headers=headers)

print(response.text)

curl --request GET \
  --url https://api.coralogix.com/mgmt/openapi/dataplans/data-usage/v2/export-status \
  --header 'Authorization: Bearer <API_KEY>'

post.summary: Update Data Usage Metrics Export Status

schema.title: Update Data Usage Metrics Export Status Request
schema.description: This data structure is used to update data usage metrics export status.

x-codeSamples.source:
curl --request POST \
  --url https://api.coralogix.com/mgmt/openapi/dataplans/data-usage/v2/export-status \
  --header 'Authorization: Bearer <API_KEY>' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"enabled":true}'
